mapper.insert: insert into smbms_provider ( proCode,proName,proDesc, proContact,proPhone,proAddress, proFax,createdBy,creationDate,idPicPath) values(#{proCode},#{proName},#{proDesc}, #{proContact},#{proPhone},#{proAddress}, #{proFax},#{createdBy},creationDate,#{idPicPath})
mapper.select:
select * from smbms_provider where 1=1
and proName like concat('%',#{proName},'%')
and proCode like concat('%',#{proCode},'%')
